description: Deploy an instant 'vibe coding' sample app: upload or paste your HTML and host it in IBM Cloud Object Storage.

inputs.name: ibmcloud_api_key
inputs.label: IBM Cloud API Key
inputs.description: Your IBM Cloud API key — needed to authenticate Terraform. Don't worry, it's safe!

inputs.name: region
inputs.label: IBM Cloud Region
inputs.description: Region where resources will be created.

inputs.name: cos_crn
inputs.label: COS Instance CRN
inputs.description: The CRN of your IBM Cloud Object Storage instance.

inputs.name: bucket_name
inputs.label: Bucket Name
inputs.description: Name of the bucket where the sample app HTML will be uploaded.

inputs.name: make_public
inputs.label: Make Bucket Public
inputs.description: Whether to make the bucket publicly accessible.

inputs.name: sample_app_html
inputs.label: Sample App HTML
inputs.description: HTML content for your sample app. Defaults to the included sample-app-index.html file.
